html:
6.5.22  2:44 pm   i'm still heads over heels for New Canaan since i first heard it years ago. it's such a sweet song.  what's your favourite season?

      the new one

6.5.22  1:54 pm   Do you get annoyed when you answer the same questions?

     no

     Additionally, has this question been asked before?

      yes

6.5.22  1:18 pm   what are the chords to "i'm a huge gamer" at 1:17 to 1:22. kept playing this on loop

      i actually don't know which part you mean, because it depends whether you mean the video or audio version. they are the same song, but in the audio only version, the intro scene is skipped so the timeline would be displaced by about 25 seconds

6.5.22  12:13 pm   bill, what's the worst part about being so cool and awesome?

      having to explain it to the authorities

6.5.22  11:10 am   thoughts on calculators?

      they are perfect for calculating how many calculators you have

6.5.22  4:25 am   how can i learn to sing in tune? I have played the trumpet for like 9 years now and have sung throughout it and have decent pitch, but often i struggle with singing a note in tune without a backing track

      see if you can join a choir

6.5.22  2:37 am   Whats the meaning of life?

      it's you

6.5.22  2:21 am   has every question already been asked?

      so far, most of them have not been asked yet

6.5.22  1:54 am   what is the bad thing you did?

      lost at tic-tac-toe, despite going first

6.5.22  1:35 am   when was the last time, before the gamer video, that you scored yourself talking?

      that would have to be wild frolicking

6.5.22  1:03 am   Is there an underlying lore to your channel and website?

      well yes. for much of the time, during my life, i feel these exploding feelings of wanting to express every bit of everything, from every different possible way. there is a feeling that i need to create infinite different identities and infinite different paradigms and make an infinite amount of content in all of them. After feeling deflated and sad about not being able to actually do that, at some point i pick myself up and just put it all in the same place, and assume that i'll get where i'm going somewhere along the way

6.5.22  12:50 am   can you inspire me

      i'll see what i can do

6.5.22  12:15 am   IM SO BORED it's etched deep in my heart how bored I am. Do you have any suggestions for things to watch

      it might be time to make your own thing

6.4.22  10:46 pm   Hey Bill Wurtz! I made a question a while ago and I can't find it. Could you help me find my question please?

      sure

6.4.22  10:29 pm   Is it rewarding to just put your songs online and not play it to people?

      well, one thing for sure is it's very uncomfortable to be in the room with someone while they are hearing it for the first time. so the best way to play my music for someone is to put it somewhere and then let them have the freedom to listen to it at their own time and place

6.4.22  7:42 pm   Do you frolick?

      can't stop

6.4.22  7:24 pm   What's your opinion on the public?

      open to new ideas, not stubborn,

6.4.22  7:21 pm   I know you'd prefer to make a new song to be your favorite. Does this mean that each song you make you like better than the last?

     it's my job to make it that way. if it's even possible

      Or can you look at, say, five songs you made in a row at any given time and the one you like the most isnt the most recent?

     all i know is, it's my job to make each one the best. ..... if that's even possible. And if i'm doing my job properly, i must have convinced myself at that moment that that is possible. so the only way i'd know if i'm right is to know if that's possible. which, of course, i don't

6.4.22  7:16 pm   favorite color?

      tan

6.4.22  5:35 pm   what does orange rhyme with? i always said porridge

      florence, normals, boredoms, gorgeous,

6.4.22  3:30 pm   why is my favorite song you made always 2 releases prior to your newest song

      songs tend to get better with age. you respect them more over time. with brand new songs, there is a sense that maybe if you could have gotten my attention just a few days ago you could have convinced me to somehow make it better. or perhaps make it as good as some of the previous ones

6.4.22  3:03 pm   In "if the world doesnt end" I cannot pass the "and now its lunchtime" part without a massive goofy grin on my face. Why? How did you manage to do this?

      lunchtime is goofy. that's just a fact

6.4.22  3:02 pm   I've been trying to get to know music better through actual songs like you advise, but I've been having trouble. I can hear the main melody and what the bass is playing, and by being able to hear the tonic/key it's in, I can play the melody and bassline quite easily on the piano after and transpose to any other key, but I don't know how to hear all the notes that the guitar and piano/keyboard are playing. Most of the time, I can barely even hear them over the drums/percussion. Even in solo piano/guitar arrangements though, it's very difficult to hear the notes other than the melody and bass. Should I be trying to hear each individual note and then put it together one by one to make find out the chord, hear the chord all at once, or something else entirely?

      to start, yes, you can just brute force listen to each note one by one. This may seem brutal at first, but just remember: chords are just as hearable as words. when you get used to it, you'll be able to hear a song in a crowded store and you'll know what the chords are. Even if you literally can't hear the chords, you'll hear them because you'll know what they are based on the context. same as you can understand a person in a crowded room even if you don't hear every word. So just be aware that that skill is waiting for you. But yes, you may have to start out with brute force note by note. Another thing you can do is, find some songbooks that you trust. And then find recordings you trust, of those songs. This can be another way to familiarize yourself with things. but if you stick with it, i'd say it's only a matter of time before you can actually predict upcoming chords of songs you've never heard. just like you might be able to predict almost exactly what words i

6.4.22  12:57 pm   are chord progressions temporary key changes?

      not really / not usually

6.4.22  12:17 pm   have you ever used a slap bass sound in a song/video other than the corner store?

      i've been sprinkling little bits into almost every song since 'best friends with my own front door'

6.4.22  9:21 am   taking off the special sandals (in the song fly around) allows you to now fly around. therefore, the special sandals are actually heavy weights preventing flight. is that correct?

      logically that is to be assumed, at least from the first verse

6.4.22  1:08 am   have you ever wanted to stop doing anything,

     sure

      and if so what made you keep going?

      also wanting to do it

6.4.22  12:55 am   did at the corner store come about because you went to a corner store?

      in retrospect, it probably came about because i've been to corner stores. not one specific time. it's just an experience that i'm familiar with

6.4.22  12:52 am   what is the approximate length of your next song/video/whatever?

      between 30 seconds and 5 minutes

6.3.22  11:06 pm   What's better communism or capitalism?

      they are both so good i can't decide

6.3.22  8:00 pm   i wanna do everything, how can i tell what the thing i love most is? 

      in this case, it's everything

6.3.22  5:12 pm   You went sub 3 minutes with a song for the first time in 3 years. Does this make you feel anything

      it was very convenient during the production process, because there were several unknown and new factors to deal with

6.3.22  4:23 pm   good song, whats your favorite one you've made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

6.3.22  2:54 pm   what do you think about while you are making songs?

      i tend to think a lot about how to make it good. but unfortunately, 'thinking' of any kind usually stalls and sabotages all creativity. so at some point, by some method or another, the thinking must stop in order for the creative process to function properly

6.3.22  12:26 pm   Hey Mr. Bill Wurtz!

I'm just one of a thousand fans. I wonder if you've ever thought about doing a "behind-the-scenes" of a Bill Wurtz video?

     yes

      I am watching ylur "If the world doesnt end"-video right now and I'm awed. What kind of creative thinking is going through your head when you make these videos?...

     trying to maximize the value of the audience's experience

     because you ARE human after all...right? ... ... ... RIGHT?!

      yes

6.3.22  12:08 pm   how to stop overthinking

      just think about everything once.

6.3.22  12:00 pm   is tetris a good game?

      it gets good after level 79

6.3.22  9:19 am   why do you want to learn 3d

      get some perspective

6.3.22  9:05 am   i'm bored, what should i do?

      how about ushering in a new era

6.3.22  8:42 am   how to tell someone "I like you" without saying it; I guess what I'm asking how to act around someone I like without coming across pushy

      act any way you want. if you like each other then this will be enjoyable for both

6.3.22  6:53 am   Will your next video be a song?

      i'm not sure

6.3.22  6:27 am   Do you like geography?

      yes

6.3.22  2:40 am   is i'm a huge gamer most of the time a video or a song or both

      both

6.2.22  10:44 pm   Would you run for president?

      no

6.2.22  8:51 pm   is your next song about circles

      probably not

6.2.22  8:51 pm   i noticed you used "it's you" in your new song the same way you often use it here on the questions page.

     that's not true. in the song, i used it with melody and chords and full musical accompaniment, and also there was a graphical rendition in the video. When i say it on the questions page, it has absolutely none of that whatsoever

     was your writing of this line inspired by how often you find it to be the right answer to things on this page?

      no

6.2.22  7:50 pm   how does reality work

      normally

6.2.22  7:26 pm   how do you make songs

      impossible. it can't be done

6.2.22  7:11 pm   Need to know your favourite mythical creature. Goats don't count...

      life hack, if you make a new myth you get to make a new creature

6.2.22  6:16 pm   Can you make a song about time and/or clocks

      probably too much
